transcript:
Customer: je vyakti ne call karo chho te bija koi call par vyast chhe. tame rah joi shako chho athva thoda kshano pachhi call karisho.
Hello?
Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: ha yes.
Executive: Hello. ha ji sir very good afternoon.
Hello.
Customer: ha yes tell me.
Executive: bhai sorry sir aapko.
Customer: Hello aa rahi hai.
Executive: ha ji sir clay oil and allied industries me baat ho rahi hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: ji sir india mart se raksha baat kar rahi hu shailesh ji baat kar rahe hai na sir.
Customer: kahiye ha.
Executive: ha sir abhi sir dekh rahi hu mai india mart ka jo platform hai aap use nahi karte hai bilkul bhi.
Customer: kya nahi use karte?
Executive: sir india mart ka aapne package le rakha hai na platform aap use nahi kar rahe hai bilkul bhi.
Customer: Okay kya karna hai humko.
Executive: sir wahi janna chahti hu meri jab last time aapse baat hui thi 11 november ko to maine aapse kaha tha ki kya aap busy rehte hai aapka business hai apna.
offline to aap thoda sa isme use kar liya kariye matlab aapka account to bilkul hi sir.
Customer: use karna kariye mane kya karna hai humko samajh nahi pad raha hai.
Executive: sir by lead consume kar lijiye ha. by lead consume. by lead aapko to usi time bole na humko nahi kaam aati hai by lead sab generic rehti hai.
100 me se do kaam ki hoti hai wo direct humko inquiry bhej hi dete hai waha se.
Executive: acha sir calls bhi aapko to wahi chalta hai to humko direct aa hi jati hai usme hamara email address dal dete hai to direct karega na party generic kaam nahi karte.
100 me se do entertain hoti hai 100 ka jawab dene me hamara nahi hai idhar me.
Executive: faltu ka time waste karne ka koi matlab nahi hai inquiry humko milti nahi hai party alag generic bhej dete hai wo log to.
Executive: sir inquiry by lead jab aap consume karenge tabhi to aapke paas inquiries ka flow calls ka flow badhega.
Customer: abhi to bole ki first me hi aata hai aur aapke pehle manager hote bolte kholne se aap hi ka to aata hai first.
Executive: sir sir aap hi ka hi first aata hai maine aapko ye cheez bola ki aap jab consume nahi mai aap first listing ki baat nahi kar rahi aapke mai aapke by lead ki baat kar rahi hu product ki aapki baat kar rahi hu ki jaise ki aap jo reading karte hai ki aapki company koi nayi to hai nahi purani company hai aapki almost wo aapki visibility wo cheez aayegi aapki offline aur online dono.
Customer: thik hai.
Executive: matlab ab yahi hai ki abhi aap by lead consume karne se kya fark padega humko ye khali bata dijiye na madam.
Executive: sir by lead consume karne se hum log khol kar ke dekh lete hai nahi lagu padta hai to band kar dete hai aur kya kare.
Executive: sir aapne mujhe bataya tha last time ki multani mitti me bahut log deal karte hai wo multani mitti ke bahut se types hote hai. hai na?
Customer: ha.
Executive: mai premium quality me deal hi karta hu yahi meri baat hui thi na aapki yaad aayega aapko bhi mujhe bhi yaad hai sab cheez baat aapki.
Customer: usse kya hua humko usse kya fark pada.
Executive: sir fark padne ki baat nahi hai mai aapko sirf ye bata rahi hu.
Executive: ki client aap jab by lead loge hi nahi to client aapko inquiries kaise bhejega calls kaise karega by lead ki india mart ka jo flow up hai wo by lead pe depend karta hai jab aap by lead aapko to total 34 by lead milti hai kyuki aapne trust seal chala rahe ho MDC ke ab aapke listing hai.
Executive: thik hai to aapko 34 by lead milti hai aap usme se ek bhi nahi.
Customer: consumption mane kya what is consumption mean consume nahi kare mane kya.
Executive: sir consumption ka matlab hai ki aap by lead ke wale portal pe jaye click contact now by karke jo bhi aap genuine by lead aapke product ki aapko post ho rahi hai aapko jo lag raha hai ki ha mai isse baat kar lu kariye aapki 34 by lead.
Customer: baat mane phone se baat karne ki hai mujhe.
Executive: phone pe hi to baat karna hai aur kaise aap baat karenge.
Customer: mane phone karna hai party ko.
Executive: nahi nahi jo by lead bhejta hai usko phone karna hai.
Customer: ha ji sir.
Customer: aur phone kisko party ka number hai usme dala ki aapka generic number hai.
Executive: dekhiye sir aap jis bhi coin of by lead click karenge na to jis bhi party aapko inquiry bhej rahi hai uski detail aapke paas.
Executive: by lead jo bhi karta hai uski bhi list.
Executive: uski sari detail hogi usme number bhi aa jayega uska number aapko milega contact now by pe click karoge aapko uska number bhi show ho jayega sir.
Customer: ha to kaam ka nahi ho to kya kare hum.
Executive: sir inquiry humko nahi kaam ki aap hi bataiye aapne kis time 34 by lead puri use ki aur sari ki sari useless thi.
Customer: abhi nahi ki na pehle to kiya tha na khol kar ke usme to kuch nahi hua na aapke pehle bhi to manager the na wo bhi to bata ke diye the usme humne to ek mahina pura sab by lead consume karke zero ho gaye hamari to bhi ek inquiry nahi aayi.
Customer: hamara aadha ghanta jata hai by lead ke piche to kuch matlab hi nahi hai aur jisko maal chahiye wo to direct bhej deta hai humko.
Executive: sir aapke paas aapka to direct email se bhi to aa sakta hai na aapko direct bhi to customer access kar sakte hai na.
Customer: sir email se aapko email pe message aata hai.
Executive: ha ji.
Executive: aap kya keh rahe hai email pe aapko message aata hai aap ye keh rahe hai.
Customer: ha to email se party to phone karke mang leti hai bhai ye product banate hai aapke website pe humne dekha hai aap ye product dete hai hum bolte hai ha dete hai to email karte hai to usko maal chala jata hai khatam ho gayi baat.
Executive: dekhiye aapki baat sahi hai.
Customer: wahi to taklif hai jab bhi india mart se phone aata hai meri baat sahi rehti hai aap humko simply kyu nahi keh dete ki by lead consume karne se kya hone wala hai hum consume kar lenge abhi dekhiye do din me sab consume ho jayega thik hai chodiye.
Executive: sir.
Customer: nahi nahi karte dekhte kitne inquiry aati hai humko pehle dekha hua hai aap ek manager thodi hai aapke pehle kitne manager badli ho gaye 10 saal se 15 saal se aapke sath hai jab se aapne shuru kiya tab se hum aapke sath hai humko malum hai itne salo me by lead ki hamara history dekh lijiye na kitni by lead hui hai humne.
Customer: aur kitni.
Executive: by lead ka kya hai ki aap jab by lead consume karoge har ek client to sir thodi na genuine nahi hai har ek client agar aapke paas 34 by lead pe maine baat ki 34 34 client keh rahe hai aise waste by lead aapne use kiya hai na aapne bola mai itne salo se use kar raha hu aap mujhse jyada jante hai india mart ke bare me thik hai sir mai aapko bolti hu ki aap aap hi bade hai to aap ye bata dijiye 34 by lead aapne ek one week me use kari sari waste thi.
Customer: aapne bola one week bhi conversion nahi hua.
Customer: nahi hua.
Executive: sir aise sir hua kaise.
Executive: 34 by lead me se thik hai mai manti hu 34 by lead me kuch clients hote honge jo genuine nahi hote honge par aap 34 ki 34 by lead ko agar aap keh de ki genuine nahi hai ye baat to sir thik nahi hogi na 99% aapko.
Customer: jo inquiry humko direct inquiry aapko ye bhi bolte hai jo india mart se direct inquiry aati hai humko phone se ya email se aati hai wo 100% convert ho jati hai to uska kya matlab hua aap humko bataiye.
Executive: sir hum yaha bhi bolte hai aap yaha bolte hai ki bhai direct nahi aati hai by lead me matlab nahi hota hai hamara time ja raha hai na.
Executive: aapke point pe hi baat karti hu aapko aapne bola mere pe aati hai to mail pe jo inquiries aa rahi hai wo aapko india mart ke through hi aa rahi hai aap ye bata dijiye.
Customer: ha bolte hai na india mart se aapka phone number liya tab to yahi batate na hum to puch lete na phone se kaha se diya.
Executive: listing ke liye hi to mai keh rahi hu na aapki.
Customer: india mart se to unko contact direct mil jata hai direct phone se karta hai na madam aapko aapko ek banarasi sari leni hai to aapke generic bhejenge banarasi sari aapko to study karenge dost ko puchenge kaha se leni hai kya leni hai hum example aapko dete hai aapko gadi leni hai to hum char jan ko puchenge na humko ye toyota gadi.
Executive: aap mujhe example mat dijiye mai aapko example de rahi hu thik hai agar aap mail se hi hum log de rahe hai hum sach aap bolte hai hum sache bol rahe hai to humko thik hai rehne dijiye hum check kar leta hu by lead.
Customer: sir by lead ka fark kya padta hai aapko padti hai na hamare website me kuch fark padta hai ki aapko.
Executive: aapki listing pe sir website pe aapko kya website aap india mart use kar rahe ho india mart ke through aapka listing chal raha hai usme dikh raha hai jab aap by lead nahi use karoge calls nahi pick karoge effect nahi karega aap mujhe bata rahe the ki mai dost ke liye aap ye karenge effect nahi padega kya.
Customer: dikhta nahi hai kya nahi dikhta hai.
Executive: sir dikhta nahi hai aap bole hamare to aa rahi hai koi kholta hai to hamare hi aage aa raha hai.
Executive: sir maine aisa aapko nahi bola hai ki aapko jab kholta hai aage aate hai aap MDC ke ab jo client hai aapke pehle manager ne bataya ki pehle hi khulta hai koi dabakar dabaiye na aap dabaiye.
Executive: sir mai aapko information de deti hu ki MDC me jitne bhi client honge unse aap upar dikhte hai MDC me jitne bhi client hote hai na unse aap upar dikhte hai mai ye cheez aapko bolungi.
Customer: upar dikhte hai.
Executive: aap ek hamara package hota hai na basic jo aap pehle use karte ho jab aapko to pata hi hai sari aap jante hi hai aap kya india mart jab se mai juda hua hu tabhi ki baat hai.
Customer: to hamara upar nahi aa raha hai abhi MDC koi dabayega to hamara website ke upar.
Executive: acha kyu nahi aayega sir aapki purani company hai aapko nahi malum aap paisa to aapko bhar dete hai fir aap bolte hai nahi aata aa raha hai aapko malum hum to kholte nahi hai.
Executive: sir aap to ekdam ekdam gusse me kahi aur ka gussa aap utare ja rahe hai pehle sir sun hi nahi rahe hai.
Customer: nahi madam aapka har india mart ka phone aata hai yahi bolte hai by lead consume karo consume karo usse fark kya padta hai humko khali bata dijiye na bhai hamara nikal jayega isme se hamara niche utar jayega to hum samajh jayenge chaliye.
Executive: sir dekhiye maine aapko ye lakh lakh aapko bharte rehte hai.
Executive: sir maine aapse kaha tha ki aap jaise use kar rahe hai ki kya aapki purani company thi kya aapne mujhe multani aapne mujhe khud bataya ki multani mitti ke bhi types hote hai raksha aur mai usi me hi deal karta hu thik hai to mai yahi keh rahi hu ki thik hai aap aapko agar usse benefit mil raha hai aapko bas benefit dilane ka kaam hai mera aap kahi se aap satisfied hai satisfied rahiye par at least aap sir ek do by lead pe baat karke ho sakta hai na conversion ho jaye hum negative hi kyu soche hum positive hi to soch ke soche ha mai baat karta hu client agree ho jaye wo le le aapko lagta hai ki email pe jo by lead aati hai wahi sahi hai but ek baar aap isko bhi baat karke dekhiye contact now by pe click karke dekhiye usme bhi client se baat kijiye.
Customer: kuch nahi ho raha hai fir kya kare hamara to time gaya na madam.
Executive: hamara hum khud ko karne hai hamare liye hum khud karte hai na baat hamare office me to hai nahi 25 aadmi ki baat karne ke liye.
Customer: hum khud baat karna padega na humko kuch thik hai madam mai dekh leta hu by lead consume ho jayega do din me kar leta hu by lead kuch hoga to aapko bol deta hu.
Customer: aapko bhi malum pad jayega sab hamara jo karte hai aapko to jyada malum padta hai india mart se.
Executive: mujhe kya ham karwa lete hai hamare aadmi log bolte hai kuch matlab nahi hai kholne ke baad hamara aadmi khud jo dekhta hai isko bolte hai kuch nahi hua.
Customer: uska bhi time jata hai wo PDF bhejo ye bhejo sab attachment bhejo rate bhejo sab bhej dete hai usko fir kuch nahi ho raha hai hamara to pura hamara to pura product list uske paas chala gaya hamara kya banate hai kaise banate hai pura cheez detail chala gaya competitor hai usko sab malum pad gaya hum kya banate hai.
Executive: sir ek aisa nahi hota sir aapko sirf.
Executive: karna hai catalog product dekh sakta hai agar wo deal aage ja rahi hai tab aap apni baki information do catalog share karo jisme photo jayengi product ki price jayega kya kya usme add ho jayega bas.
Customer: india mart se nahi dekh sakta hai.
Executive: sir dekhiye aisa hota hai ki agar aap client ko apni taraf se batate ho dekh to sab kuch sakta hai sir.
Executive: par inquiry jyada se kahi na kahi to dekh raha hai na aapki listing aapko hi kyu dal raha hai bhej raha hai aapko request india mart me se ek baar aap baat kar lo puch lo aapki baat sahi hai ki ha mere computer jaan jate hai.
Customer: thik hai thik hai thik hai ek baar mujhe lene dijiye by lead leke aata hu fir baat karenge abhi thik hai.
Executive: thik hai thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting genuine inquiries from buyleads.

- Believes buyleads consumption is a waste of time.

- Concerned about competitors accessing product details.

Resolution:

- Executive explained the benefits of consuming buyleads.

- Executive clarified the process of contacting buyers.

- Customer agreed to consume buyleads in two days.

Next Steps: 

- Customer will inform the executive if any issues arise.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, inquiries, competitors
